name: Ticking (Supertoady)
description:
Controls:

Arrow keys / WASD to move

How to Play:

You are a bomb in a post-apocalyptic lava world and need to keep your flame from reaching your core so you do not explode!

The only thing keeping you from the lava is the constanly moving forcefield that you need to stay in forever to keep your body from burning.

Your flame will tick down evry time the platform moves, but you can collect clocks to reset the timer so you do not run out of moves.

Made in 3 hours for the Monthly Game Jam #3 and the Trijam #187
